blog.title: Varied Fanfics.

Requests are always open for one-shots.
My Hero Academia Master List

title: Worthy(G, One-Shot, Midoriya Izuku/GenderNeutral!Reader)
body:
A Midoriya/Neutral!Reader One-shot based on soulmates because I can’t stop myself. 

Requests are open for One-Shots and drabbles involving MHA dudes. Lay em on me fam.

When your words first appeared, your heart sang.

Of course, the words themselves were a reason to celebrate, but as the days went on and the words slowly came into view, your heart was full of love for the one that would someday say those words to you. They were beautiful, and though they were written in shaky handwriting, the feelings behind them drove you to be better and better to be deserving of them.

They’re part of the reason you wanted to be a hero, so you could push yourself to be the best version of yourself you could be, so you could help as many people as possible and be worthy of the words written across your collarbone.

That’s why when you were accepted to U.A. High School, you were elated. Another step to becoming the kind of person your soul mate thought you were. All the hard work hadn’t been for nothing, and every night before you went to sleep you ran your fingertips over the words and wished that wherever they were out in the world, they were happy and warm and smiling.


U.A. was intimidating, with its sprawling floor plan and looming hallways. Finding your classroom had been easy, and you settled yourself quickly in your assigned seat, practically vibrating in excitement for the rest of your career here. You would excel, you felt it inside of every bone in your body.

A piece of you was disappointed that you hadn’t met your soulmate today, though the words you exchanged with others in class had been few and far between. Aizawa had been adamant about the quirk appraisal testing and didn’t leave much room for chatter. Still, when you went home and laid in bed that night, you were hopeful. There was always tomorrow, right?


Something inside your heart pulled you to the infirmary after your first Hero training. No one had been seriously hurt with the exception of Midoriya Izuku, a boy you hadn’t given much of a glance to, but you had admired his conviction during his practice today. It made you a bit worried that he hurt himself so much using his quirk, but he had done it to protect Uraraka and help his team win. Determination like that was enviable.

Recovery Girl only waved you through as you entered the infirmary, and you followed her direction to one of the cots in the back of the room with a curtain around it. Midoriya was sitting up, one of his arms bandaged tightly to his chest while the other was the entry point for an IV drip. He looked worse for the wear, but his face turned into a hesitant smile when you entered through the curtains.

His mouth opened for a moment, a slight flush on his cheeks at the sight of you, but you cut him off before he could begin and spoke instead, “I know we don’t know each other that well, but I just wanted to say that I really admire what you did today. You’re going to be a great hero, I believe that in my heart, and if it’s not too much to ask, I’d really like to be your friend.”

Midoriya’s mouth clapped shut with a click of his teeth, his lower lip wobbling, and immediately his eyes started to well up in tears. With both of his arms out of commission, he could do nothing but bow his head and openly cry with quiet sobs that slowly got louder. Immediately, you thought you had said something insensitive and moved to sit on the bed next to him with your hand reaching out for his un-injured hand, “Did I say something wrong? I’m sorry, I can be forward sometimes, but I really—”

Midoriya’s head snapped up and you finally got a look at his expression. He was crying… with a smile on his face? His cheeks were still flushed, but the light behind his eyes illuminated his features despite his wet cheeks, “I-I’ve waited so long to hear that, to hear y-you… I love you, I’ve loved you since the first second I could read your words t-to me… I knew you were special, a w-wonderful person that I never wanted to… t-to let down…”

The breath left your lungs in one squeeze, and you knew your expression slowly started to mirror Midoriya’s, tears and all, “Y-You’re my—”

“Soulmate,” Midoriya laughed out, and you couldn’t help yourself from flinging an arm around his shoulders and pulling yourself to his chest. His wince made you mindful of his injured arm, but the weight of his head settling on top of yours was more than enough to distract you from unintentionally hurting him.

Slowly, you opened your eyes again and his collarbone was in your sights. You hadn’t looked before, it was considered rude to read someone’s soulmark without asking, but now it was staring you in the face. Your words, written in your handwriting, were placed delicately along the lines of his collarbone. Reaching a hand up, you ran a fingertip along them, and Midoriya let out a small laugh that was weak from his tears.

“M-My whole life I… I’ve wanted to be a hero, a-and when I was told I was quirkless… I was l-lost… Then your words came, and e-every night I’ve read them and hoped you were out there happy and safe, until I-I could be a strong enough hero to keep you safe myself, the one person that believed in me before they had even spoke to me for the first time…”

Tears welled up in your eyes again from his heartfelt words, and you buried your face in his neck again. Midoriya’s chest shook from his breath, the long sigh of contentment wavering from the weight of everything that had transpired in the few short minutes since you arrived. His heartbeat raced against your cheek, and you were sure yours matched it when you felt the gentle press of a kiss on the top of your head.

blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Papa Killed A Man
description:
by thewunderkind

All for One’s daughter genuinely wants to become a hero.

Midoriya Shizuku inherited her father’s brilliant mind and persistence so she stops at nothing to make her ambition come true.
He knows that he should be mad, that he should be angry but for some reason he can’t help but become proud when she slowly reaches her dreams. This is a tale of how a girl slowly learns about heartbreak, pain and betrayal. A tale where a villain actually raises his daughter right… kind of.

It is in which ‘no’ might make them angry but it will make you free— if no one has ever told you, your freedom is more important than their anger.

Words: 3686, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence

  • Characters: Sensei | All For One, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Kurogiri (My Hero Academia), Midoriya Izuku, Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Bakugou Katsuki, Shinsou Hitoshi, Todoroki Shouto, Uraraka Ochako, Monoma Neito, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Class 1-B (My Hero Academia), League of Villains (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Midoriya Izuku & Sensei | All For One, Midoriya Izuku & Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku/Shinsou Hitoshi, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto
  • Additional Tags: Sensei | All For One is Midoriya Hisashi, Parental Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Parental Kurogiri (My Hero Academia), Female Protagonist, Female Midoriya Izuku, Genderswap, Genderbending, Platonic Relationships, Emotional Manipulation, All For One A+ Parenting, Mind Games, Smart Midoriya Izuku, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot, Slow Burn, Izuku slowly realizes that Hisashi is a villain, Internal Conflict

trail.content:
by thewunderkind

All for One’s daughter genuinely wants to become a hero.

Midoriya Shizuku inherited her father’s brilliant mind and persistence so she stops at nothing to make her ambition come true.
He knows that he should be mad, that he should be angry but for some reason he can’t help but become proud when she slowly reaches her dreams. This is a tale of how a girl slowly learns about heartbreak, pain and betrayal. A tale where a villain actually raises his daughter right… kind of.

It is in which ‘no’ might make them angry but it will make you free— if no one has ever told you, your freedom is more important than their anger.

summary: I’m dying from laughing. Can I please get headcannons for All Might, Izuku, and Bakugo with an S.O. who’s quirk is “Tiny”? Like,...
question: I’m dying from laughing. Can I please get headcannons for All Might, Izuku, and Bakugo with an S.O. who’s quirk is “Tiny”? Like, she’s literally 3 feet tall and she can shrink down to molecular levels, and she likes to shrink down to pocket size and be carried like that. (She can control how small she is unlike Mt. Lady) But because her base height is so short, people always mistake her for a small child and she has to ride in one of those children’s car seats with the cup holders.
answer:
probably would be my quirk tbh

written on 14/05/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.

tiny quirk || headcanon

toshinori yagi

  • he thinks its absolutely adorable but also hella fascinating
  • like you can shrink down to molecular levels? what isn’t cool about that? he’d probably nerd out over that to be honest
  • probably always craps “pocket size partner” jokes
  • low key gets offended for you whenever someone mistakes you for a child
  • probably can’t stop smiling when he sees you sitting in a kids car seat

izuku midoriya

  • biggest nerd about it e v e r
  • he probably asks you ever single question you could ever fathom and probably unintentionally comes up with ways you can use your quirk for the benefit
  • he does get worried though when you randomly disappear when he doesn’t know when you are
  • “WHAT IF I CRUSH HER”
  • probably thinks its adorable that you have to sit in a kids car seat

katsuki bakugou

  • he probably thinks its lame at first
  • but then he’s like: actually thats kind of cool
  • definitely freaks out whenever you disappear because he doesn’t know where you are and god knows what could happen to you
  • low key thinks its adorable when he can put you in his pocket
  • but hell if anyone makes fun of you then they’re going to have to deal with him

written on 14/05/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.

body:
Sir Nighteye: I’m making coffee, how do you take yours?
Deku: Black?
Sir Nighteye: Don’t try to act tough.
Deku: Cream?
Sir Nighteye: Oh, coming right up madam.
Deku: Cream and sugar?
Sir Nighteye: What are you, Mirio?
Mirio: Nighteye, I want it black
Deku: Surprise me?
Sir Nighteye: *splashes coffee at Deku but he dodges it*

summary: hi! im for the match up, im new so idkksksk. my name is kosmi and im very short. im usually quiet and alone, since.. i dont have...
question: hi! im for the match up, im new so idkksksk. my name is kosmi and im very short. im usually quiet and alone, since.. i dont have much friends..😅i tend to act happy more than actually being happy. but now i try to be my real self. im actually somewhat bittersweet. i like art, books, cuddles and (very much) tea but i also like dark rooms, ghosts and horror. ((writing this made me realise how much of a mess i am))
answer:
written on 14/05/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.

✎ Shouto Todoroki

  • shouto’s the one for you!
  • he himself is usually quite quiet and mostly alone, but he will definitely welcome you whenever you sit with him. as he isn’t much of a talker, he certainly won’t pressure you into talking to him, and he’s more than happy to just sit there and enjoy your presence whilst the two of you chillax. it really helps calm him down and unwind from the day.
  • he knows the difference between when you’re happy and when you’re only faking your happiness, and when he knows you’re faking it he’ll try his damn hardest to cheer you up. he isn’t the most skilled in that department, but it’s the thought that counts and he definitely shows that he cares about you. sometimes he’ll buy you things or leave you little notes in the hopes that it’ll cheer you up, and he’s glad when you start acting like your normal self because of the small things he’s tried to do to cheer you up.
  • if he can’t cheer you up with little notes and presents then he’ll cuddle you within an inch of your life. once the two of you get home he’ll drag you to the bedroom or couch and just cuddle you all evening until you start feeling better. he’s certainly not complaining though, it’s his favourite thing to do and the longer he gets to cuddle you the better!
  • shouto’s kind of nonchalant when it comes to ghost and horror - they don’t scare him and they’re not particularly stimulating for him - but as long as he gets to relax with you then he’s absolutely fine with it. he really likes to chill out with you and it helps him unwind, and it makes him happy that h can ‘protect’ you whenever you get scared or freaked out by something.

written on 14/05/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.

summary: Hi, I wanted a student matchup. I'm an autistic trans lesbian, but more importantly I'm a huge nerd. I love math and science, or...
question: Hi, I wanted a student matchup. I'm an autistic trans lesbian, but more importantly I'm a huge nerd. I love math and science, or studying just about anything. I have a vulgar sense of humor, and love comedy. I'm not great at talking to people, but also don't have a sense of shame, so I manage to be shy and weirdly outgoing. I like to talk with people about philosophy or political theory, I'm generally big-headed. I'm also in love with the goth/punk aesthetique.
answer:
written on 14/05/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.

✎ Ochaco Uraraka

  • ochaco’s the one for you!
  • she thinks its adorable that you’re a total nerd and he thinks its so cute when you nerd out, but sometimes she kind of gets confused by all of the stuff you talk about and can never keep up with you. she’s more than happy to buy you merch and spend hours watching your favourite shows and movies with you.
  • she’s glad that you love to study, because she really struggles to study sometimes and needs that motivation from another person to help her along. she enjoys your company when the [pair of you study together and its super enjoyable for her. she finds it really relaxing to work alongside you and knows that if she ever gets stuck on anything she can go straight to you for help. its reassuring to her that you’ll help her with whatever you can.
  • she can’t help but get flustered and embarrassed by your vulgar sense of humour at times, but she does enjoy it all the same. she’ll find herself crying from laughter whenever you say something random that’s hilarious and is definitely more than happy to rewatch videos of comedians performing with you. she’ll probably surprise you by taking you to a few gigs from time to time and the two of you most likely have tonnes of inside jokes together!
  • she respects that sometimes you struggle to talk with people and will never force you into a conversation or situation that you’re uncomfortable with. she understands that you struggle with social situations, and honestly she talks enough to make up for the fact that you aren’t really into the whole social scene. she makes sure other people respect the fact that you may not want to talk to them too and always makes sure that you’re feeling comfortable - its her top priority.
  • she does like the fact that you’re outgoing in your own way though, but sometimes she has to remind you to tone it back a little bit. she doesn’t want other people to be rude to you because of how blunt you are about everything, and if she does ask you to keep some things to yourself its only because she doesn’t want anyone to be rude to you and subsequently upset you.
  • she definitely enjoys hearing about your philosophical and political views, and admires that you can be so passionate about them. she often asks you about your views, and is more than happy to just sit and listen whilst you rant about them, chipping in every so often. she’s glad that you have something that you’re intensely passionate about and really hopes that you can continue to develop that passion!
  • she thinks your goth/punk aesthetic is super cool! sometimes she’ll try some of your clothes on, but honestly she doesn’t think it really suits her. she spends most of her time admiring your fashion sense and helping you pick out outfits she thinks will look good on you, although sometimes her taste is really bad.

written 14/05/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.
